document_data.caption: A map showing Surtr's Maw on Llorgh.
document_data.name: Surtr's Maw
document_data.mainbody: '''Surtr's Maw''' was a small mountain found on the island of [[Llorgh]] in [[Norheim]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: Surtr's Maw covered the southern half of Llorgh, touching both [[Northwind Strait]] and the [[Sea of Moonshae]]. The mountain covered approximately {{SI|50|sq mi|k}} of land.
